Title.evidence: In the OPTIMIZE trial, we randomly assign elderly KTRs

Intervention.evidence: standard-exposure calcineurin inhibitor (CNI), mycophenolate mofetil, and prednisolone or an adapted regimen with low dose CNI, everolimus, and prednisolone

Objective.evidence: Finding ways to improve the COVID-19 vaccination response in this vulnerable population is of uttermost importance.

Method_Outcome.evidence: we measured the humoral response after 2 (N = 32) and 3 (N = 22) COVID-19 mRNA vaccinations and the cellular response (N = 15) after 2 vaccinations.

Result_Outcome.evidence: The seroconversion rates of elderly KTRs on a standard immunosuppressive regimen were only 13% and 38% after 2 and 3 vaccinations, respectively, whereas the response rates of KTRs on the everolimus regimen were significantly higher at 56% ( P = 0.009) and 100% ( P = 0.006).
